detailsData.title: Client-First Approach
detailsData.content: Our Houston personal injury lawyers take your case as personally as you do. We build stronger cases by getting to know the real people behind them.

detailsData.title: Expertise in Personal Injury
detailsData.content: We bring decades of experience and success to the table. See how our Houston personal injury attorneys won the trust of people just like you.

detailsData.title: Reputable Representation
detailsData.content: Our Houston personal injury lawyers have earned the trust and esteem of our clients and colleagues both in and out of the courtroom.

detailsData.title: No Win, No Fee
detailsData.content: For personal injury cases, we operate on a contingency basis, receiving payment only if you get the compensation and justice that our clients deserve.

valueProp: As former insurance company defense attorneys, Grimes & Fertitta know the ins and outs of how your insurance company will approach your personal injury case. Our personal injury lawyers for Houston and The Woodlands leverage this unique understanding to craft stronger arguments, anticipate potential problems, and build your case for the best possible outcome. With our decades of experience, we have successfully brought a broad range of cases to trial. We’ve been hired by clients in need of everything from a skilled car accident lawyer in Houston to a knowledgeable work injury lawyer in Houston; from a family in need of a Texas elder abuse lawyer to a mourning spouse in search of a wrongful death lawyer.

testimonalData.text: I would highly recommend Grimes & Fertitta if you're needing an attorney. I have used them twice, both were when I was involved in car accidents involving large commercial vehicles. Richard always made us feel that we were his only client, he was always responsive and took the time to make sure we understood everything. He was very professional and personable in every conversation. He fought hard for us and never steered us in the wrong direction.
testimonalData.author: Jason S.

testimonalData.text: I have had the pleasure of being represented by this firm, and have absolutely nothing bad to say about them. They are down to earth, kind, patient and goodhearted people. They helped me receive a good sum of money in a timely fashion. I wouldn’t have wanted to represented by anyone else. You can trust them entirely.

testimonalData.text: I retained Richard Grimes after I sustained a Traumatic Brain Injury. Richard and everyone at Grimes and Fertitta were absolutely amazing. I will always be grateful to them for taking my case and giving me the best representation possible!
